Commands for The C.B. include:

  • /help*
  • /ping
  • /kick
  • /ban
  • /mute*
  • /unmute*
  • /bulkdelete
  • /announce
  • /serverinfo*
  • /userinfo*
  • /avatar*
  • /invite(Invites the bot)
  • /sinvite(Invites you to our server)

For more information, please visit our Discord server.

For a full list of features, please visit our features page.

* these are a work in progress and or not Implimented
